sentences.sContent: The actual tests would employ the well-honed methods of operant conditioning, developed initially on pigeons, in which the test subject has first to work out what is going on by trial and error.
sentences.sContent_eng: The actual tests would employ the well-honed methods of operant conditioning, developed initially on pigeons, in which the test subject has first to work out what is going on by trial and error.
sentences.sCn: 实际的测试会采用精确的操作性条件反射方法，测试对象首先要清楚实验的过程和错误。

synos.tran: 自发反应；操作性制约；发生作用之人或物

remMethod.val: oper(工作； 运转) + ant → 运转中的； 起作用的人

words.tran: 操作的；[外科] 外科手术的
有效的；运转着的；从事生产劳动的
操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算
经营者；操作员；话务员；行家
[计] 操作数；[计] 运算对象

trans.tranCn: 运转中的；生效的；操作性的

trans.tranOther: a person or thing that operates
